metadata.title: Compression Arthritis Gloves for Men Women Arthritis Compression Gloves
features: This is a medium-sized pair, please rest assured to buy.【High Quality Updated Arthritis Gloves】 For the stitching crack problem of other fingerless compression gloves, we have adopted the latest stitching technology. At the same time, the professionals were asked to re-examine each pair of compression arthritis gloves. Minimize the possibility of tear stitching. Available in 3 sizes, when the size you choose is right, your hand will feel compressive and a little tight.

【Relieve Arthritis Stiffness and Pain】 Open finger arthritis gloves for women & men will provide you a gentle compression, reducing swelling and stiffness, speed up recovery relieve symptoms of arthritis RSI carpal tunnel tendonitis.By providing gentle compression, you can provide extra support for the thumb, fingers, wrists and knuckles by focusing on the pressure points and providing extra warmth. This allows you to focus on what really matters in your life!

【Comfortable All Day Wear】 Lightweight, breathable, comfortable unisex design compression gloves for men women, can be worn at night and during the day, allows moistures and excess heat to escape while retaining therapeutic heat to soothe hands and knuckles without becoming hot and uncomfortable. Open fingertips allow freedom to feel, touch and grip. Convenient for our work and life.If your gloves are dirty, just put them in normal clothing and wash them.

【Multi-Use Compression Gloves for Pain】 Whether cold hands, swollen hands, hand stiffness, mild arthritis osteoarthritis, rheumatoid arthritis, carpal tunnel syndrome and sport-related injuries our compression gloves for swelling arthritis hands will provide symptom relief in style! Mild arthritis compression gloves men women relieve pain, does not affect work and life .The open fingertip design allows you to use your mobile phone to cook without worrying about groping or slipping.

【Compression and After-sales】When the size you choose is right, your hand will feel compressed and a bit tight, which is normal. If you feel very tight and feel uncomfortable - the size is too small. If you feel that there is no compression or a bit loose, it has no effect on you - the size is too large. For whatever reason, please contact us and we will replace the gloves of the appropriate size.
description: Rehabilitation Training Gloves, Help You Relief of Various Limb Pain Arthritis Compression Gloves Highlights 1. High performance composite material that provides maximum compression and support for the hand joint during exercise and exercise. 2. Ergonomically designed for all-round motion with excellent comfort and smoothness. 3. Reduce injuries and restore arthritis, pain and pain. 4. Maintain hand joint comfort and warmth, increase blood flow, help restore joints and muscles 5. High quality technology has durable and comfortable materials that offer tremendous advantages in overall health How do I determine the size? To find your correct size, I recommend that you use the size chart on the product details page to find your size and choose the glove that fits your size. To measure your size, you can use a tape to measure around the widest part of the palm, not including the thumb. If you're between sizes, choose the lower size for extra compression and upper size for reduced compression. Small Size: 5.5"-6.8" (or 14cm ¨C 17cm) Medium Size: 6.8"- 7.9" (or 17cm ¨C 20cm) Large Size: 7.9"- 9.3" (or 20cm -24cm) Warm Note As compression glove, we recommend that you choose the right size, can not be too big. So that when you wear it, help you keep the compression pressure to help you for arthritis pain relief.After wearing, the sense of compression is normal. Open Finger Compression Arthritis Gloves Using Compression arthritis gloves helps to keep the hands warm and provides mild compression enhancing blood circulation reducing swelling and stiffness.
